description.ruby-sapphire:
Creates a huge wave, then
crashes it down on the foe.
description.emerald:
Creates a huge wave, then
crashes it down on the foe.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A big wave crashes
down on the foe.
Can also be used
for crossing water.
description.diamond-pearl:
It swamps the entire
battlefield with a
giant wave.
It can also be used
for crossing water.
description.platinum:
It swamps the entire
battlefield with a
giant wave.
It can also be used
for crossing water.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
It swamps the entire
battlefield with a
giant wave.
It can also be used
for crossing water.
description.black-white:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant wave.
It can also be used for crossing water.
description.black-2-white-2:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant wave.
It can also be used for crossing water.
description.x-y:
The user attacks everything around it by
swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
This can also be used for crossing water.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user attacks everything around it by
swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
This can also be used for crossing water.
description.sun-moon:
The user attacks everything around it by swamping
its surroundings with a giant wave.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks everything around it by swamping
its surroundings with a giant wave.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks everything around it by swamping
its surroundings with a giant wave.
description.sword-shield:
The user attacks everything around it by swamping
its surroundings with a giant wave.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
